fields.name: Cannondale Quick Disc 5 City Bike 2021 Matte Black
fields.description: A swift, sporty bike that’s perfect for getting a workout, city cruising or just getting out and feeling good. Highlights are Lightweight aluminum frame with 360° reflective accents, Shimano Tourney TX 14-speed drivetrain with disc brakes and Integrated connectivity with Cannondale App

fields.name: Merida Speeder 100D 2021 Blue
fields.description: Redesigned for MY20 with more sporty geometry with longer reach. The frame can accomodate wider tyres making it more versatile - up to 37mm (32mm with mudguards). All models run hydraulic disc brakes for all weather reliability and come with a tapered carbon fork.

fields.name: Ridgeback Comet Standard Frame Red 2021
fields.description: The Comet is built around a confidence inspiring 6061 heat treated aluminium frame and a chromoly fork to give you a stable and comfortable ride. It has been finished with a single chainring up front to keep maintenance low and a high-quality Shimano 7 speed 11-32 cassette to still offer a gear range that will allow you to take on any terrain. stopping is taken care of by Promax V-Brakes front and rear to make the Comet a fantastic all-round urban bike.

fields.name: Skoda City Lady Classic Bike
fields.description: The ŠKODA CITY Lady bike in a stunning retro style is primarily designed for cycling around town in comfort. It features a low step-over frame, making it easy to get on and off the bike. The cream frame and mudguards, a comfy imitation leather saddle and brown tyres with reflective strips enhance the exceptional design of this bike.

fields.name: KTM Life Lite City Bike White 2020
fields.description: KTM Life Lite City Bike is built around a confidence inspiring 6061 heat treated aluminium frame and a chromoly fork to give you a stable and comfortable ride. It has been finished with a single chainring up front to keep maintenance low and a high-quality Shimano 7 speed 11-32 cassette to still offer a gear range that will allow you to take on any terrain. Stopping is taken care of by Promax V-Brakes front and rear to make the KTM Life Lite City Bike a fantastic all-round urban bike.

fields.name: Cannondale Treadwell EQP 27.5 2021 Alpine
fields.description: The Treadwell EQ is a great runabout. It’s perfect for short, quick rides. Running errands or a bit of shopping is what this is made for, and it puts a smile on your face every time.

fields.name: Ridgeback Element EQ City Bike
fields.description: A lightweight understated classic urban bike packed full of features, the Element is fully equipped to take on the Urban jungle with flat mount hydraulic disc bakes and a 3x9 Shimano drive train to help you get over any terrain and a light weight 6061 heat treated aluminium frame which is finished with a aluminium fibre fork all makes the Element the ideal Urban bike for the modern individual.

fields.name: Ridgeback Avenida 7SP Nexus LDS City Bike
fields.description: With the classic comfortable upright riding position, the Avenida is known for the Avenida 7 is the perfect bike for the person who wants a relaxed comfortable ride. We have equipped the Avenida 7 with a high-quality low maintenance Shimano Nexus 7 speed internal hub to offer you a wide range of gear to take on any terrain you may face. We have also given the Avenida 7 a full length chain guard and full-length mudguards to make sure the dirt and grime stays well away when riding in any weather.

fields.name: Cannondale Treadwell Neo EQ Electric City Bike 2020
fields.description: An e-bike for any day and anywhere. Fun and light to rip around the neighborhood for meet ups, running errands or Sunday fun days. The new optional Battery or “Range Extender” from ebikemotion is one of the most interesting accessories of X35 propulsion system. Its 208w complement the 252w of the main inner battery reaching 450w as total capacity. This numbers can move the system during 4.5 hours with a medium consumption of 100wh that is currently the media consumption of the system.

fields.name: Ridgeback Cyclone Gents 2020
fields.description: Designed for everyday use, a short test ride of the Cyclone and you will soon realise it is the perfect companion for any leisure or commute rides. The use of Shimano's bench-mark STePS system provides a high level of reliability and an ease of use to match. With a charge time of four hours and a range of up 125km, STePS makes the Cyclone the perfect bike for the person who wants to get to work on time by missing all the traffic and not arrive hot and bothered. The Cyclone has all the bells and whistles you will ever need with the remarkable Shimano STePS system for when you need a little assistance, full mudguards perfect for those rainy morning commutes.

fields.name: Merida Eone-Forty 9000
fields.description: Carbon front triangle with integrated battery technology, paired with 6016 rear end with aggressive enduro/trail geometry and 133 mm rear wheel travel - Shimano STePS E8000/E7000 motors allow for short chain stays delivering agility. Internal cable guide for rattle free running. Full carbon motor bracket creates an integrated appearance of the motor into the frame as well as provides an extremely strong connection between frame and motor. A two-component battery cover, which offers the perfect protection for the internal battery of these models. The softer (outer) layer reduces noises, seals the downtube perfectly and absorbs hits from trail debris easily, while the harder (inner) layer ensures that the battery does not get damaged and gives it the structural shape.

fields.name: Merida E-Speeder 400 EQ
fields.description: Brand new for MY21 a new range of eLeisure bikes powered by the Mahle eBikemotion system. Five models all based on the same versatile geometry frame. Each model has a specific fork and componentry to match its application. The frame has mounts for mudguards and rack and a neat hidden kickstand mount, generous tyre clearance means you can run up to a 40mm tyre and mudguards. Cable routing is through a specific headset cap to keep the cockpit nice and neat.

fields.name: Ridgeback Electron Di2 2020
fields.description: The Electron Di2 uses Shimanos bench-mark STEPS system to provides a high level of reliability and an ease of use to match. With a charge time of four hours and a range of up to 125km, the Electron Di2 pushes the E-bike market into new territory. The Electron Di2 makes the most of the Shimano STEPS system by incorporating Shimanos Di2 Electronic shifting in to the mix, this make sure the rider has a crisp precise shift 100% of the time.

fields.name: Cannondale Treadwell Neo 650
fields.description: An e-bike for any day and anywhere. Fun and light to rip around the neighborhood for meet ups, running errands or Sunday fun days. Light, powerful ebikemotion rear-hub drive system / Range: up to 75km/47mi. Integrated connectivity with Cannondale App / rear light.

fields.name: Cannondale Synapse Neo EQ
fields.description: Electric road bike with an internal frame battery. The Range to Roam: Quiet, light, and drag free - the super-strong Bosch drive unit and long range battery are beautifully integrated into the Synapse NEO frame. Go further than ever.

fields.name: Merida E'Spresso 300 EQ SE
fields.description: Electric road bike with an internal frame battery. The Range to Roam: Quiet, light, and drag free - the super-strong Bosch drive unit and long range battery are beautifully integrated into the Synapse NEO frame. Go further than ever.

fields.name: Cannondale Synapse Tiagra Disc 2021 Blue
fields.description: A road bike that’s light, stiff, fast and surprisingly comfortable. Your rides will go longer. You'll barely notice. Highlights are Lightweight SmartForm C2 Alloy Frame with full carbon fork, Shimano Tiagra 10-speed drivetrain with dual chainring FSA crank and Promax Decoder R mechanical disc brakes.

fields.name: Merida Scultura 100 Claris 2021 Silver
fields.description: Scultura has won stages of the Grand Tours and combines class leading comfort with whippet-like acceleration. Our lightweight aluminium version is made with 6066 series triple butted and hydroformed aluminium tubing with smooth welding.  Features include: Full carbon tapered fork for light weight and precise steering and internal cable routing. Scultura 100 is Shimano Claris equipped.

fields.name: Merida Scultura 400 105 2021 Red
fields.description: Scultura has won stages of the Grand Tours and combines class leading comfort with whippet-like acceleration. Our lightweight aluminium version is made with 6066 series triple butted and hydroformed aluminium tubing with smooth welding.  Features include: Full carbon tapered fork for light weight and precise steering and internal cable routing. Scultura 100 is Shimano Claris equipped.

fields.name: Cannondale Synapse 105 Disc 2021 Candy Red
fields.description: Scultura has won stages of the Grand Tours and combines class leading comfort with whippet-like acceleration. Our lightweight aluminium version is made with 6066 series triple butted and hydroformed aluminium tubing with smooth welding.  Features include: Full carbon tapered fork for light weight and precise steering and internal cable routing. Scultura 100 is Shimano Claris equipped.

fields.name: Cannondale Synapse 105 Disc 2021 Black Pearl
fields.description: Scultura has won stages of the Grand Tours and combines class leading comfort with whippet-like acceleration. Our lightweight aluminium version is made with 6066 series triple butted and hydroformed aluminium tubing with smooth welding.  Features include: Full carbon tapered fork for light weight and precise steering and internal cable routing. Scultura 100 is Shimano Claris equipped.

fields.name: Cinelli Vigorelli Disc 105 Hydro Bike
fields.description: The hugely versatile steel frame with excellent ride quality returns for 2020 in a new disc brake version. Constructed in Columbus Thron tubing and matched with a Columbus Futura Carbon Disc fork, the Vigorelli was designed in conjunction with the riders of Team Cinelli Chrome, Red Hook Crit Champions and sports a beautiful metallic blue paint with chrome decals. The advanced engineering of the different steel tube thicknesses for different parts of the frame allows for perfect weight distribution that only this material can produce. It enjoys minimal toe overlap and a higher bottom bracket position.

fields.name: Merida Scultura 400 Hydraulic Disc 105 2021 Black
fields.description: Our Pro Tour proven Scultura adapted to run disc brakes. Class leading comfort and cutting-edge technology. 6066 series triple butted and hydroformed aluminium tubing with smooth welding.  Tapered full carbon fork head tube for precise steering and 12mm bolt through axles for stiffness. Highlights of the 400 - 22 speed Shimano 105 drivetrain, Shimano 105 hydraulic disc brakes and full carbon tapered forks.

fields.name: Genesis Equilibrium Shimano Bike
fields.description: There is good reason why the equilibrium has been a staple in our range for many a year now - the combination of a lightweight, durable Reynolds 725 frame, classic looks, full-length mudguard capabilities, sublime ride and handling qualities has made it a true riders' favourite; to many the quintessential four-season UK road bike. With a little more relaxed geometry versus a conventional road race frame (longer wheelbase, slacker headtube angle & more fork offset), the Equilibrium is our lightweight steel all-rounder, ideally suited to big mile rides where comfort, stability and efficiency come before KOM leaderboards.

fields.name: Giro Caden Urban Standard Helmet
fields.description: he Caden offers a sophisticated style with advanced head protection technology, making it a perfect match for your on-the-go lifestyle. The light, yet tough In-Mold shell helps to resist dents and dings from life on the streets, and the Roc Loc City fit system makes fit/feel adjustment almost effortless. Thoughtful details include reflective accents, a lock port for securing the helmet with your bike or a bag when you’re on the move, and a removable cycling cap-style visor that accents your style without compromising ventilation.

fields.name: Giro Cinder Mips Helmet
fields.description: The Cinder MIPS provides all the features an avid road rider wants in a lightweight package. The design is inspired by the classic aesthetic of our premium Synthe helmet, offering similar performance and style. Key features include the Roc Loc 5 fit system, which allows you to easily dial in fit tension and adjust vertical position with a single hand. Air-FX padding offers comfort on your longest rides, and the helmet is equipped with MIPS to redirect impact energy, providing more protection in certain impacts.

fields.name: Lazer One Plus Helmet
fields.description: The Lazer One+, a skate style inspired cycling helmet. Classic styling combined with modern production technologies create a lightweight but durable helmet. It has ventilation channels in the EPS to provide sufficient cooling, while a hard shell construction makes sure the helmet can take a beating. The integrated TS+ fit system allows for a snug and comfortable fit, every time.

fields.name: Giro Agilis Mips Road Helmet
fields.description: Giro MIPS provides all the features an avid road rider wants in a lightweight package. The design is inspired by the classic aesthetic of our premium Synthe helmet, offering similar performance and style. Key features include the Roc Loc 5 fit system, which allows you to easily dial in fit tension and adjust vertical position with a single hand. Air-FX padding offers comfort on your longest rides, and the helmet is equipped with MIPS to redirect impact energy, providing more protection in certain impacts.

fields.name: Giro Agilis Standard Road Helmet
fields.description: Giro MIPS provides all the features an avid road rider wants in a lightweight package. The design is inspired by the classic aesthetic of our premium Synthe helmet, offering similar performance and style. Key features include the Roc Loc 5 fit system, which allows you to easily dial in fit tension and adjust vertical position with a single hand. Air-FX padding offers comfort on your longest rides, and the helmet is equipped with MIPS to redirect impact energy, providing more protection in certain impacts.

fields.name: Giro Quarter FS Standard
fields.description: The Quarter is one of the lowest-profile helmets we’ve ever made, and it’s also the lightest we’ve made with an ABS shell. The essentials are here – an EPS liner for impact management, a tough outer shell, riveted webbing anchors and plush, sweat-absorbent pads for long-lasting comfort. Another standout feature -- the Roc Loc Vert dial fit system allows you to easily adjust the helmet for a secure and stable fit. Available in a bunch of great colors and three Super Fit sizes.

fields.name: Bell Formula Road Helmet Standard
fields.description: There's no reason to skimp on comfort and protection while trying to maintain a budget. The Formula benefits from the same technologies that make our road helmets such champions of comfort and safety; this model features the MIPS impact management as well as our Float Fit retention system and innovative Sweat Guide liner. Elegant shape, fluid aerodynamics and ample ventilation ensure the Formula's place as a classy all-rounder.

fields.name: Lazer Century Road Helmet With Integrated Light
fields.description: The Century helmet is the result of 100 years of expertise. By integrating all knowledge and user requirements into one concept, the Century offers a new benchmark that requires no priorities for either protection, comfort, aerodynamics or visibility. The Century offers it all! One of its most visible new technologies is the unique Twist Cap, which offers a twist-of-the-hand action to change the Century from a full-ventilated helmet into an aero helmet.

fields.name: Lights Set Cateye
fields.description: Super bright front and rear lightset Lithium-ion polymer rechargeable battery with micro USB port Runtime 1 - 7 hours Pocket sized, compact, sleek design with three modes - constant high, constant low and flashing Push button switch operation is easy.

fields.name: Lights Set Infini
fields.description: Super bright front and rear lightset Lithium-ion polymer rechargeable battery with micro USB port Runtime 1 - 7 hours Pocket sized, compact, sleek design with three modes - constant high, constant low and flashing Push button switch operation is easy.

fields.name: Lights Set Cateye
fields.description: Now with upgraded brighter more efficient LED’s. The incredibly stylish, but compact EL-135 measures just 2.5 x 3.5 x 9cm. Pair this with the Omni 5 rear light and you truly have a powerful light set up.

fields.name: Front Light Cateye Ampp 500
fields.description: 500 Lumen maximum output, Opticube lens technology for supreme light distribution, Robust matt polycarbonate body with enhanced scratch resistance, FlexTight bracket – suitable for bars up to 35mm diameter and selected aero bars, 2.5x greater Lumen output on Low mode compared to Volt 500XC, for increased versatility, 220% larger side lens for a significantly wider beam and enhanced side visibility, Power button illumination and red indicator @ 20% battery capacity, Redesigned underside connection for easier removal from the FlexTight bracket, Double click to High mode, Single click returns to previous mode, Light Mode Memory, Recharge time: 4hrs ( 1A ) – 8hrs ( 0.5A ), Battery: Li-Ion 3.6v 2200mAh, Waterproof rating: IPX4, Weight: 95g.

fields.name: Light Set Cateye Ampp 500
fields.description: Perfectly matched for features and functions the extremely popular AMPP400 is now paired with the Rapid Micro rear light. Both feature the simple and secure FlexTight brackets. The AMPP400 is perfect for urban riding, the compact, lightweight Cateye AMPP 400 offers impressive functionality and visibility, whilst the powerful Rapid Micro gives you a feature rich, long lasting and highly visible rear safety light.

fields.name: Cateye Kinetic Rear Light
fields.description: 50 Lumen maximum output, Opticube lens technology for supreme light distribution, Robust matt polycarbonate body with enhanced scratch resistance, FlexTight bracket – suitable for bars up to 35mm diameter and selected aero bars, 2.5x greater Lumen output on Low mode compared to Volt 500XC, for increased versatility, 220% larger side lens for a significantly wider beam and enhanced side visibility, Power button illumination and red indicator @ 20% battery capacity, Redesigned underside connection for easier removal from the FlexTight bracket, Double click to High mode, Single click returns to previous mode, Light Mode Memory, Recharge time: 4hrs ( 1A ) – 8hrs ( 0.5A ), Battery: Li-Ion 3.6v 2200mAh, Waterproof rating: IPX4, Weight: 95g.

fields.name: Cateye Rear Light
fields.description: 50 Lumen maximum output, Opticube lens technology for supreme light distribution, Robust matt polycarbonate body with enhanced scratch resistance, FlexTight bracket – suitable for bars up to 35mm diameter and selected aero bars, 2.5x greater Lumen output on Low mode compared to Volt 500XC, for increased versatility, 220% larger side lens for a significantly wider beam and enhanced side visibility, Power button illumination and red indicator @ 20% battery capacity, Redesigned underside connection for easier removal from the FlexTight bracket, Double click to High mode, Single click returns to previous mode, Light Mode Memory, Recharge time: 4hrs ( 1A ) – 8hrs ( 0.5A ), Battery: Li-Ion 3.6v 2200mAh, Waterproof rating: IPX4, Weight: 95g.

fields.name: Front Light Cateye Sync Core 500LM
fields.description: 500 Lumen maximum output, Opticube lens technology for supreme light distribution, Robust matt polycarbonate body with enhanced scratch resistance, FlexTight bracket – suitable for bars up to 35mm diameter and selected aero bars, 2.5x greater Lumen output on Low mode compared to Volt 500XC, for increased versatility, 220% larger side lens for a significantly wider beam and enhanced side visibility, Power button illumination and red indicator @ 20% battery capacity, Redesigned underside connection for easier removal from the FlexTight bracket, Double click to High mode, Single click returns to previous mode, Light Mode Memory, Recharge time: 4hrs ( 1A ) – 8hrs ( 0.5A ), Battery: Li-Ion 3.6v 2200mAh, Waterproof rating: IPX4, Weight: 95g.
